doc:
Dean Martin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dean_Martin 0 Dean Martin (born Dino Paul Crocetti; June 7, 1917 – December 25, 1995) was an American singer, actor, comedian, and producer. One of the most popular and enduring American entertainers of the mid-20th century, Martin was nicknamed "The King of Cool" for his seemingly effortless charisma and self-assurance. He and Jerry Lewis formed the immensely popular comedy duo Martin and Lewis, with Martin serving as the straight man to Lewis' slapstick hijinks. A member of the "Rat Pack", Martin went on to become a star of concert stages, nightclubs, audio recordings, motion pictures, and television. Martin was the host of the television variety programs The Dean Martin Show and The Dean Martin Celebrity Roasts. His relaxed, warbling, crooning voice earned him dozens of hit singles, including his signature songs "Memories Are Made of This", "That's Amore", "Everybody Loves Somebody", "You're Nobody Till Somebody Loves You", "Sway", "Ain't That a Kick in the Head?", and "Volare". Dean_Martin ( born Dino_Paul_Crocetti ; June_7_,_1917 – December_25_,_1995 ) was an_American_singer , actor , comedian , and producer . One of the_most_popular_and_enduring_American_entertainers of the_mid-20th_century , Martin was_nicknamed " The_King of Cool " for his_seemingly_effortless_charisma_and_self-assurance . He and Jerry_Lewis formed the_immensely_popular_comedy_duo_Martin_and_Lewis , with Martin serving as the_straight_man to Lewis '_slapstick_hijinks . A_member of the_"_Rat_Pack " , Martin went on to_become a_star of concert_stages , nightclubs , audio_recordings , motion_pictures , and television . Martin was the_host of the_television_variety_programs The_Dean_Martin_Show and The_Dean_Martin_Celebrity_Roasts . His_relaxed , warbling , crooning_voice earned him dozens of hit_singles , including his_signature_songs " Memories Are_Made of This_" , " That 's Amore_" , " Everybody Loves Somebody_" , " You 're Nobody Till Somebody Loves You " , " Sway " , " Ai_n't That a_Kick in the_Head ? " , and " Volare " .
